attributes.action: Stop fining people who find their wheelie bin inadequate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please use common sense when people have their bin lids open, for at least the bin lid length. Most offfendors are families who cannot recycle plastics without the use of the car.Please provide bins for plastics, and then fine!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
